help.title: Help & Support
help.faqDescription: Find answers to common questions about using our platform
help.faq1: How do I create a new project?
help.faq1Answer: To create a new project, go to your dashboard, click on 'My Projects', then click the 'Create New Project' button. Fill in the required details and submit the form.
help.faq2: How do I submit a proposal for a project?
help.faq2Answer: Browse available projects, select one you're interested in, then click the 'Submit Proposal' button. Fill out the proposal form with your price, delivery time, and a detailed description of how you'll complete the project.
help.faq3Answer: Our platform uses a secure escrow system. The client funds the project, and payment is released to the freelancer once the work is completed and approved.
help.faq4: How do I communicate with clients/freelancers?
help.faq4Answer: You can use our built-in messaging system to communicate with clients or freelancers. Go to the 'Messages' section in your dashboard to start or continue conversations.
help.faq5: How do I get verified on the platform?
help.faq5Answer: To get verified, go to your profile settings and select the verification option. Upload the required documents and wait for approval from our team.
help.contactDescription: Need more help? Our support team is here for you
help.emailDescription: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours
help.liveChatDescription: Chat with our support team in real-time for immediate assistance
help.phoneDescription: Call our support line during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM)
help.guidesDescription: Step-by-step guides to help you navigate our platform

help.guide2Description: Tips for creating project listings that attract the best freelancers
help.guide3Description: How to write proposals that stand out and win projects
